**<sub><sub>![P2 Badge](https://img.shields.io/badge/P2-yellow?style=flat)</sub></sub>  Keep displayed app version in sync with release version**

The new `APP_INFO.VERSION` constant is set to `0.1.0`, but this repoâ€™s current app version is `0.2.0` (`package.json`), and this screen previously displayed `0.2.0`.
